item.title: Webscraping specific e-comerce websites to csv files - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

I have a list of 10 e-commerce websites that i need to extract data from (name, brand, price, images, link, size, color, description, other).
1,000 to 20,000 products on each site
Each website is a different in terms of UI and code.
One website as an example:
https://www.terminalx.com/women/all

the final result should be either:
1. File for each website with identical column structure.
or
2. If possible a no-code tool working solution that I can run and modify on my own with some one time guidance (ill pay for the tutoring time).

*websites are in Hebrew (not sure if that's an issue) since ill be helping you map the fields and the code titles and all is in English anyway.

I've been using webscraper.io for a while now and I like it. if you can create it there that could be the best way to go.

You can price it by the hour or by website. we will do the math together

Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 16, 2023 12:24 UTC
Category: Data Extraction
Skills:Data Scraping, Data Extraction, Data Mining, Web Crawling, Python
Country: Israel
click to apply
item.content:encoded:

I've been using webscraper.io for a while now and I like it. if you can create it there that could be the best way to go.

item.title: Adding companies in the laboratory devices industry to HubSpot requires Data entry and Web Research - Upwork
item.description:
1. Verify ~360 companies to see if they manufacture devices with a screen that are used for medical/laboratory/industrial purposes by browsing their website.
2. Either add the company and its contacts (~3 per company) to Hubspot if the company does not exist or just add the new contacts if it already exists.
3. Choose the categories of products the company manufactures on Hubspot.

We need people who know how to use Hubspot (must) and preferably know about laboratories. One week is the deadline for this job.

It is important that this data be high-quality so that we can run effective marketing campaigns.

In our industry 4.0 start-up, we specialize in digitizing laboratory devices like scales, liquid handling machines, and autoclaves.

Budget: $210
Posted On: July 16, 2023 10:56 UTC
Category: Lead Generation
Skills:Data Entry, Lead Generation, Data Scraping, Accuracy Verification, Company Research, Microsoft Excel
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Data entry engineers for email scrapping required at SMMA - Upwork
item.description:
Works closely with human resources to recruit, interview and train new data entry employees. Organizes schedules, performs regular coaching and counseling and disciplines employees as needed.
Clearly communicates job expectations to data entry team, while monitoring, appraising and reviewing their work. Enforces company policies and procedures as necessary.
Input customer account information into databases within required time limits.
Compile and verify the accuracy of data to prepare it for computer entry.
Apply data techniques within the program and following all procedures.
Generate data reports and perform backups in archives.
Improves results by participating in and completing audits, identifying weaknesses and implementing improved changes.
Updates job information and knowledge through participation in continued education.
Keeps all company information confidential.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 16, 2023 10:34 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Data Entry, Administrative Support, Data Scraping, Email Communication, Data Mining
Country: Kenya
click to apply

item.title: Lead Generation Contact Database - Upwork
item.description:
Hi there, we have someone to generate a leads for us on a weekly basis. We regularly need to build lead lists, so this will be an ongoing role with our company.

Right now, we need 100 week that match these criteria:

The main focus needs to be on SEO agencies that work with businesses that provide services to B2C (Business to Consumer).  leads. Companies could provide other marketing services like Website development and PPC but their primary focus should be SEO. Examples of really good B2C businesses are:

Personal injury attorney
Residential Carpet cleaning
Residential HVAC
Residential plumbing services
Residential Roofing
Residential Gutter cleaning
Residential construction / Contractor services
Residential Painting and decorating
Residential home removal
Residential real estate agent
Residential Garage Door Installation
Residential Bathroom / Kitchen remodelling
Residential Pool Installation /
Pool Maintenance
Residential Window cleaning
Residential Tree surgery
Residential Lawn care services and landscape gardening
Residential electrical services
Residential pest control services
Residential appliance repair
Residential Locksmith services

- Business Location: United States

- Contact person should be People (CEO, FOUNDER, CO-Founder, President, Owner)

- Number of employees 5-35.

- Example of one good lead is lawrank.com.

P.S: Please read the job description carefully and provide a sample of 10 leads according to the job requirements in order to be considered for this position. Use the spreadsheet bellow as a template for the sample leads. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1uHDPq7ckY3Kh4J3S9GPYmOhn9JQgRD8QrkNCEAdo7AU/edit

Thank you!


Hourly Range: $4.00-$6.00
Posted On: July 16, 2023 10:19 UTC
Category: Lead Generation
Skills:Data Entry, Lead Generation, Prospect List, Data Scraping, List Building, Contact Info Research, LinkedIn
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Find real estate listings and land owners for us - Upwork
item.description:
Hi, we are long-time visitors to the coastal area between Buchupureo and Curanipe in central chile and we would like to purchase coastal land, defined as within 1 mile of the coast line.  Because the real estate market is not that developed in this area, we would like local expertise in identifying who owns the underlying land in certain areas, which we will specify post project, and we'd like to be able to find their contact info.  We have ~ 5 areas we are focused on and will be able to provide GPS information.  We want you to help us find the contact info of the owner, either email or cell phone.  We're happy to expand this project into something longer term if this also requires having someone local to speak to the land owners about selling their land.  We expect only a small piece of this land to actually be listed by a real estate agent.  

We need someone who speaks both english and spanish well.  

Thank you!


Posted On: July 16, 2023 09:38 UTC
Category: General Research Services
Skills:Data Entry, Data Scraping, Data Mining, Lead Generation, Real Estate, List Building, Microsoft Excel, Prospect List, Market Research, Online Research
Country: Netherlands
click to apply
item.content:encoded:
Hi, we are long-time visitors to the coastal area between Buchupureo and Curanipe in central chile and we would like to purchase coastal land, defined as within 1 mile of the coast line.  Because the real estate market is not that developed in this area, we would like local expertise in identifying who owns the underlying land in certain areas, which we will specify post project, and we'd like to be able to find their contact info.  We have ~ 5 areas we are focused on and will be able to provide GPS information.  We want you to help us find the contact info of the owner, either email or cell phone.  We're happy to expand this project into something longer term if this also requires having someone local to speak to the land owners about selling their land.  We expect only a small piece of this land to actually be listed by a real estate agent.  

We need someone who speaks both english and spanish well.

item.title: Pull Amazon Inventory Counts Into Spreadsheet for Multiple ASINS - Upwork
item.description:
---MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE WORKING WITH AMAZON DATA

Marketplace: Amazon US
- The ASINs for which I need the inventory quantity data are from Amazon US.

I am trying to pull in inventory counts per seller from an ASIN, I know there are tools / extensions that show it on the Amazon listing, but I need a tool that can pull in the counts into a spreadsheet for multiple ASINS, not just for one ASIN .

Skills and experience needed:
- Familiarity with Amazon API or a willingness to learn
- Proficiency in working with spreadsheets and data entry
- Attention to detail to ensure accurate data transfer

If you have the necessary skills and are interested in this project, please submit your proposal.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: July 16, 2023 09:16 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Data Scraping, Microsoft Excel, Amazon, Amazon API Gateway
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Data entry engineers for email scrapping required at SMMA - Upwork
item.description:
Works closely with human resources to recruit, interview and train new data entry employees. Organizes schedules, performs regular coaching and counseling and disciplines employees as needed.
Clearly communicates job expectations to data entry team, while monitoring, appraising and reviewing their work. Enforces company policies and procedures as necessary.
Input customer account information into databases within required time limits.
Compile and verify the accuracy of data to prepare it for computer entry.
Apply data techniques within the program and following all procedures.
Generate data reports and perform backups in archives.
Improves results by participating in and completing audits, identifying weaknesses and implementing improved changes.
Updates job information and knowledge through participation in continued education.
Keeps all company information confidential.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$25.00
Posted On: July 16, 2023 08:27 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Data Entry, Administrative Support, Data Scraping, Email Communication, Data Mining
Country: Kenya
click to apply

item.title: Lead generation - 1500 email addresses found and confirmed for accuracy - Upwork
item.description:
1500 email addresses need to be checked and found

Quick turnaround -- ideally, done within the next 24 hours.

1.  Some addresses are provided -- you only need to double check accuracy.  should be fairly quick.

2. Some are not available yet -- you need to scrap the web and find the verifiable, working and unbounced email addresses, ideally personal one.

Please do NOT accept the job if you cannot deliver.  I have let go two of the Upworkers already because of their over promise.  

I will consider pay 10% BONUS if you finish the job perfectly within timeframe and 100% satisfaction.

Budget: $150

Category: Lead Generation
Skills:Data Cleansing, Email Marketing, Data Scraping, Lead Generation, Prospect List, Excel Formula

item.title: Reddit Post Scraping - "Title and Author" from Jan-2021 to May-2021 - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for skilled and reliable freelancers to assist us with scraping Reddit posts for their respective "Title" and "Author" fields from the period of January 2021 to May 2021.

The selected freelancers will be responsible for extracting post titles and authors' usernames from specific subreddits for the specified timeframe. The data collected should be organized and presented in a structured format, such as a CSV file or a spreadsheet.

Previous experience in web scraping, particularly from Reddit or similar platforms, is highly preferred. Please provide examples of relevant projects if available. Start your proposal with I am http, So that I know you read it carefully.

If the initial project is completed successfully and the data quality meets our standards, there is potential for more similar projects in the future.

Please include any relevant experience, examples of previous work, and an estimated timeframe for completion when submitting your proposal. We look forward to working with skilled and dedicated freelancers who can meet our requirements and help us successfully complete this project. Thank you!


Posted On: July 16, 2023 08:09 UTC
Category: Data Extraction
Skills:Scrapy, Selenium, Python, Data Scraping, Data Mining
Country: Pakistan
click to apply

item.title: Leads generation - Upwork
item.description:
Hi,

I need a list of all modelling agencies in Leeds, Manchester, York, Glasgow, Newcastle, Edinburgh, Dublin. I need the name, phone number and Email Address of the owners. If you are able to apply a filter, focus on all north of Birmingham.

Focus on agencies that have been in business for longer than 3 years.

Do the same for all agencies located south from London- e.g. Chicester, Southhampton, Woking...

All these would be based in UK and I need location, years in business, owner phone number and Email address.

Thank you
